about_paragraph1: DOPO? is a cultural center where you can work, develop collaborative projects, and organize events, exhibitions, and every form of creative expression. The space consists of an events/co-working area, studios and workshops, and currently hosts professionals from various fields: designers, set designers, architects, and researchers.
about_paragraph2: The concept of "DOPO?" explicitly refers to trade organizations that carried out recreational activities at the end of the workday. The question mark at the end of the name indicates the great changes we are experiencing in the world of work, which we want to investigate.
about_paragraph3: TEAM: The concept of DOPO? was born from the collaboration of studios and professionals from the world of architecture, art, and design: Fosbury Architecture, Carlotta Franco, Bianca Felicori / Forgotten Architecture, Gabriele Leo, Grazia Mappa, Parasite 2.0, Salvatore Peluso.
cookie_banner_description: We use essential cookies for site functionality and analytics cookies to understand how you use our site.
cookie_policy_intro: This page describes the cookies used on this site.
cookie_policy_what_text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow the site to recognize you and remember some information about your preferences or previous actions.
cookie_policy_technical_desc: Necessary for site functionality. Do not require consent.
cookie_policy_analytics_desc: We use Google Analytics 4 to analyze site usage anonymously. These cookies are only installed with your consent.
cookie_policy_paypal_desc: During checkout, PayPal may set cookies for transaction security.
cookie_policy_google_desc: We use Google Places API for address autocomplete in the registration form. Google may set technical cookies for service functionality.
cookie_policy_manage_text: You can change your preferences at any time:
cookie_policy_browser_text: You can manage cookie preferences directly from your browser.
cookie_policy_disable_warning: Warning: Disabling technical cookies may impair site functionality, particularly authentication and payment features.
cookie_policy_gdpr_text: In compliance with GDPR and the ePrivacy Directive, this site requires your consent before installing analytics cookies.
cookie_policy_updates_text: This Cookie Policy may be updated periodically. We encourage you to check this page regularly to stay informed of any changes.
cookie_policy_contact_text: For questions about cookies, contact us at:
